name: Final Defuge
description:
Final Defuge is a single player FPS zombie shooter base defense game set in a zombie apocalypse. You play as the protagonist who happens to own a set of guns and is trying to take refuge with their new found home in a train cabin at subway station. Hordes of zombies will be trying to attack your home and you have to do whatever it takes using your guns to clean them up.

WASD - MOVEMENT
SHIFT - SPRINT
1 - Pistol (deagle)
2 - Shotgun (pump-action)
3 - SMG (MP5)
X - Prone; C - Crouch; 
Recommended DPI (400-500)

GAMEDEV Reusables (PBS Materials, Fire Effect, Water Effect) from Neil Del Gallego

Zombie - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/zombie-30232  

Flashlight for Train (mesh only) https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/electronics/flashlight-18972

Lantern for Train https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/modular-medieval-...

Cone for Zombie https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/pbr-cone-pack-48375  

Game Sound

Deagle Reload
